folder: Union St. & Scholes St., Brooklyn, NY
text:
1. 72-74 Union Ave., at and adjoining the N.E. corner of Scholes Street, as seen from South 3rd Street (shadowed). At the corner is the Synagogue named Beth Ha-Knesseth Beth Yaakov Zvi. August 26, 1935.

P. L. Sperr.

2. Union Ave., north from S. 4th St., B'klyn.
Sept. 24, 1941

P.L. Sperr, photographer
